cards.name: Blank Canvas
cards.description:
Shuffle ALL your cards in your draw pile.
Draw as many cards as there were in your hand.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Dispersion
cards.description: Exhaust a card in your hand. Add 3  (Upgraded) cards to your hand of the same cost, type and color respectively.

cards.name: Imagination
cards.description: At the start of your turn, put 1 card to your hand from your draw pile of a color you don't have in hand.

cards.name: Laser Focus
cards.description:
Choose a (2) card (cards) in your draw pile.
Play and Exhaust it (them).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Muddy Mix
cards.description:
Exhaust any number of cards in your hand. Gain 4 (6) Block and draw 1 card for each different color exhausted.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rainbow Shell
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Prevent the next time you are attacked.

cards.name: Synthesis
cards.description:
Exhaust up to 2 cards in your hand.
Add a Miracle to your hand. Upgrade it if you exhausted 2 (a) cards (card).

cards.name: UV Flash
cards.description:
Apply 1 Vulnerable. (Weak) If (and) the enemy intends to attack, apply 1 Weak instead (Vulnerable).
Draw 1 card.

relics.name: Rainbow's Optimism
relics.description: For the first Act, heal 8 HP at the end of combat.
relics.flavorText: A positive outlook can help overcome great obstacles.
